title: 150 Followers Problem
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large{\begin{cases} 2{ x }^{ 2 }-yz\left( 2-\sqrt{2}+\sqrt { 6 } \right) =\left( y-z \right) ^{ 2 }\times 2 \\ z^{ 2 }+xy(\sqrt { 3 } +2)={ (x+y) }^{ 2 } \\ \frac { y+z }{ x } =\frac { x-az }{ y-z }  \end{cases}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For some positive real numbers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x, y, z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfy the system of equations above. For some particular value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ( "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a \in \mathbb{R^{+}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ) and the ratio "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{z}{y}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ( let's say the ratio be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), there exist infinitely many solutions for the above given system in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" (x,y,z) "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Find "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \left\lfloor 1000a \right\rfloor +\left\lceil 1000m \right\rceil "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Feel free to report if you believe the question is wrong","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

title: 150 Followers Question
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many 3-element subsets of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{1, 2, 3, \\ldots , 11, 12, 13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are there for which the sum of the\n3 elements is divisible by 3?"}]}]}

title: 150 Followers Question
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x + 5)(2x- 3) = 0,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" what are all the possible values of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2x-3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"?"}]}]}

discussion.body:

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x + 5)(2x - 3) = 0 \Rightarrow "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"( x + 5 = 0 \Rightarrow x = -5)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"    "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{or        } (2x - 3 = 0 \Rightarrow x = \frac{3}{2})."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = - 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2x -3 = -13"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = \frac{3}{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2x -3 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"
